item.title: StarCraft and StarCraft II have landed on Game Pass
item.description: [News] We’re excited to welcome Game Pass members now joining us in the Koprulu Sector. While the entirety of the original StarCraft and StarCraft II’s multiplayer components are free-to-play, StarCraft: Remastered and StarCraft II: Campaign Collection are now available to anyone with a PC Game Pass or Game Pass Ultimate subscription.
